revised_title: Internal Anatomy of Rat-Flea Larva: A Detailed Study
tldr: The author conducted a detailed study of the internal anatomy of the rat-flea larva, focusing on the various systems and organs. This research aimed to understand the affinities of the order Siphonaptera and provide insights into the systematic position of the group. The study also included a partial account of the prepupal stage to facilitate understanding of the pupa, with camera-lucida drawings and detailed descriptions of the findings.
